description: HIPAA-compliant patient portal for managing health records, appointments, and telemedicine

characteristics.name: Availability
characteristics.reason: Healthcare access is critical - patients need 24/7 access to records

characteristics.name: Performance
characteristics.targetDescription: Responsive interface for healthcare providers and patients
characteristics.reason: Provider efficiency requires fast system response

characteristics.name: Scalability
characteristics.targetDescription: Scale to accommodate growing patient population
characteristics.reason: Hospital network expansion adds 10K patients quarterly

characteristics.name: Security
characteristics.target: HIPAA Technical Safeguards compliance, SOC 2 Type II certified
characteristics.targetDescription: Full PHI encryption, audit logging, access controls, MFA required
characteristics.reason: HIPAA violations: $100-$50,000 per record, up to $1.5M annually

characteristics.name: Reliability
characteristics.targetDescription: Zero medical record corruption, accurate data always
characteristics.reason: Medical record errors can be life-threatening

characteristics.name: Fault Tolerance
characteristics.target: Multi-region failover, no single points of failure
characteristics.targetDescription: Automatic failover to backup region within 60 seconds

characteristics.name: Recoverability
characteristics.reason: Patient care cannot wait - fast recovery is critical

characteristics.name: Maintainability
characteristics.targetDescription: Well-documented, modular codebase for regulated environment
characteristics.reason: Regulatory audits require clear documentation and traceability

characteristics.name: Testability
characteristics.targetDescription: Comprehensive testing including HIPAA compliance validation
characteristics.reason: Medical software requires rigorous testing to prevent errors

characteristics.name: Deployability
characteristics.reason: Regulatory compliance requires controlled change management

characteristics.name: Configurability
characteristics.targetDescription: Configure per hospital, department, and role without code changes
characteristics.reason: Different hospitals have different workflows and requirements

characteristics.name: Extensibility
characteristics.target: HL7 FHIR API, plugin architecture for integrations
characteristics.targetDescription: Integrate with EHR systems (Epic, Cerner), lab systems, pharmacies
characteristics.reason: Healthcare requires integration with existing hospital systems

characteristics.name: Interoperability
characteristics.target: HL7 FHIR R4 compliance, IHE profiles support
characteristics.targetDescription: Seamless data exchange with hospital systems and health information exchanges
characteristics.reason: Healthcare requires standardized data exchange for coordinated care

characteristics.name: Usability
characteristics.target: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance, accessibility for all ages
characteristics.targetDescription: Accessible to elderly patients, multiple languages, intuitive for non-technical users
characteristics.reason: Diverse patient population requires inclusive design

regulatoryRequirements: HIPAA (Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act)
HITECH (Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health Act)

keyScenarios.description: Ensure only authorized users access protected health information
Comprehensive audit trail for all PHI access (HIPAA requirement)
Bidirectional data exchange with Epic and Cerner EHR systems
Recover from catastrophic failure with minimal data loss
Secure, high-quality video consultations with patients

hipaa.administrative: Business Associate Agreements, workforce training, contingency planning
hipaa.technical: Access controls, audit logging, encryption, transmission security

dataClassification.PHI: Protected Health Information - highest security level
